text:
[Verse]
Love the morning light
Feel the sunshine bright
Birds are taking flight
Everything's just right

[Verse 2]
Coffee in my hand
Barefoot in the sand
We got plans unplanned
Together we will stand

[Chorus]
Oh the simple joys
We don't need no toys
Just a world that sings
Happiness it brings

[Verse 3]
Flowers in the spring
Hear the church bells ring
Life's a funny thing
Come on let's just sing

[Bridge]
Take a deep breath now
We'll make it somehow
Don't ask why or how
Just enjoy right now

[Verse 4]
Dancing in the rain
Washing off our pain
Life can seem insane
But joy we will maintain
title: Simple Joys
